bug.author: fepegar
bug.summary: Image is loaded after printing it
bug.description:
üêõBug The image is being loaded when calling , this is because the dtype is read from the data. This was introduced in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar/torchio/pull/380>#380</denchmark-link> . To reproduce In [1]: import torchio as tio
In [2]: im = tio.ScalarImage('8_T13D.nii')
In [3]: im Out[3]: ScalarImage(path: "8_T13D.nii"; dtype: torch.IntTensor)
In [4]: im Out[4]: ScalarImage(shape: (1, 560, 560, 179); spacing: (0.46, 0.46, 0.90); orientation: PIR+; memory: 214.1 MiB; dtype: torch.IntTensor) Expected behavior Image is loaded only when required, as Image is a lazy loader. Actual behavior The image data is loaded after printing the image. TorchIO version 0.18.9.
